choices: A foot shorter (4'5" barefoot/5 feet tall with 7in. heels)
2 feet shorter (3'5" barefoot/4 feet with 7in. heels)
Lilly's height with heels on (slow, medium, or fast shrinking process)
1.content: "Thank y'all! Have a good night! I wish I could sing some more!" I say into the microphone, as everyone yells "encore! Encore! Encore!" As I wave good-bye, I begin walking off stage, wearing a short, pink dress, with 7 inch heels, making me 6 feet tall, that I had to wear for my final act of the night. When I'm no longer visible by my fans, my 5'3 best friend Lilly hands me a water bottle, as per usual, and congratulates me on a good performance. As I drink the water bottle, I begin feeling more tired than usual after a performance. "Boy, that last number must've done a number on me. I'm soo tired! I can... Can hardly... Keep my... Eyes... Open." I say, lying down on the sofa in the dressing room, falling asleep immediately afterwards. I wake up to find myself…
1.title: shrunk

11.content:
I woke up to a thundering voice. "Hannah! Hannah! Wake up, Hannah!" I opened my eyes to see pink all around my naked body. I begin yelling, as I feel me being raised up. I fall out of my clothes and land on what seemed to be my bra, just oversized. I look up to see a giant hand coming for me, as I hurry to my feet. The hand picked me up, and brought me to a familiar face.
"Lilly! What happened!? I shrunk! Ohh, this has to be a bad dream…"
"No, Hannah. This is real life! You genuinely shrunk!"
In my disbelief, I stared at a now giant Lilly. "I must be the size of a Barbie doll… quick, get one of the Hannah doll's clothes and give it to me so I won't be naked." Lilly then gets any random doll takes of the clothes and gives it to me. "Oh, nice. It's the Hannah Montana "Ice Cream Freeze" inspired doll. I love this outfit." I say, as I put it on.
"Speaking of "Ice Cream Freeze"…" Lilly says placing me on the floor near some pink boots taller than I was, "Aren't these the cute, little boots for that song?" Typical Lilly, always getting distracted by shoes.
"Well, I don't know about that little part, considering I can fit in it! But, yeah, those are the boots. Listen, though. You have to sneak me out! No one can see me this small. Pick me up and put me in your purse and let's leave."
Weeeeell… I don't think that'll work because its not so much a purse, as it is a clutch." She says, pulling it out.
"Darn! I'll never be able to fit in that…" I say, looking around the giant room. "Well I'll probably fit in your pockets!"
"Sorry, but, this skirt has none!"
"Well… I guess you can put me between the waist part and your hip and cover me with your shirt."
"How about this…?" She says as she picked me up, suspends me by my jacket over the boot, and then slowly lowers me in.
"Lilly, that's perfect! Quick, grab some dolls and let's scram!" She picks up the boots, places it on another surface, and then picks up the boots again. I imagined she got some other dolls during that time.
11.title: Barbie doll size

choices: He can't stand it, and he wakes hanna up and keeps tovering.
He apologizes to her and leaves him alone with the smell.

Lilly laughs and after 10 minutes, lilly's big gas comes in and says "sorry sorry I can't hold my fart" and
When Hannah is saying no, her face is very close to lillyn's butthole and she can't close her mouth and lilly suddenly flies "prfprfprprpprprprprprpeoeppepepppprpr" and Hannah can't stand up and faint ..........
111.title: Lilly, I'm going to take you in the middle of your

113.content:
As I bounce around viciously in the boots that only one of my feet once fit in, I have to imagine Lilly is either fast walking or jogging to her car. She stops moving, and I hear her trunk open up. I hear put many things in, and then feel myself flying within the massive boot. The boot lands sideways, and I fly out of it and land on the trunk floor. "Oh man. Lilly must've forgotten about little shrunken ol' me and accidentally thrown me in the back!" I get up, and start looking around her trunk. I hear her car engine turn on, and feel her slowly pull out of the parking lot. I crawled out of my boot, to explore the trunk, to pass the time. Out of nowhere, at least 10 lipsticks half my size started rolling towards me as I found myself running so I won't be trampled. As I was running away, looking behind me at the lipsticks, that I ran into the heel part of a pair of Lilly's 6 inch Stilettos.
"Well, good to know that running into a pair if giant heels half your size really hurts!" As I get up, I see a bunch Hannah Montana dolls. "Wow... When they're life size compared to you, they go from being an honor of having an entire doll line made after "you", to downright creepy. But, I must say… look at the attention to detail! Not just on me, but the dresses. Oh! This is the "You'll Always Find Your Way Back Home" country girl dress. It's looks the exact same thing as the real one!" Wow, Mattel doesn't mess around with these things, do they?"
After looking at the other the other dolls, I realized they were all I'm dresses. "Lilly did always like my dresses." As soon as I finished my sentence, I flew to the left of the car, along with the majority of the items in the car. After have 10 Hannah dolls and 2 water bottles being piled up on top of me, I managed to break free after what seemed like 5 minutes. I saw something under a towel. As I approached it, I realized that this was undoubtedly the largest thing in the trunk, and possible even the car, aside from the now giant Lilly of course. As I approach it, it dwarfs me, which isn't hard considering I'm a foot with the doll heels on. I get under the towel and I come with a plastic door.
"A doll house?" I ask as I enter. I look around to and find 5 more Hannah dolls on just the first floor. I go up to the second and find another 5 more dolls. One if them is standing by a closet. I go inspect the closet and find there are more dresses, and only dresses. "I didn't know she was that obsessed with them, though." I felt the car stop, so I quickly run out of the doll house, leaving the 3 and 4 floor unexplored.
"Are we at our destination yet…? Where even is our stop?" I asked myself. I, again, flew to the side of the trunk, only to be covered by more dolls, and junk in Lilly's car. About 10 seconds after that, Lilly opened the trunk, and grabbed all the dolls, and me, at once. After fighting my way to the top, I saw that she had removed her wig, revealing her long, blonde hair again.
"Oh, hey, Hannah. I'm sorry, I almost didn't recognize you amongst all the dolls. They look exactly like you, after all." She said, as walked into…
113.title: During the car ride

1132.content:
Her house.
"You can call me "Miley", y'know." I told her as she's walking up the stairs.
"Nope! Since you died your hair for that 6 month tour in Europe and Asia, and you asked us to only call you Hannah, I made a promise to myself to not call you "Miley" until that time is up. And I intend to keep that promise. Besides, I can't put myself to call you "Miley" when you're blonde." She got to her room and put all the dolls on a special shelf with like 50 other ones.
"Why do you have so many dolls of me?" I asked, as I sat on her bed.
"Because," she began, as she exited her closet. She began stripping down to her underwear and bra, and began putting on her pajamas. "Ever since they began making dolls after you, they began bombarding me with dolls. Wether is was at your shows, or my dressing rooms, or even in the mail, I got Hannah dolls. I guess they know I your best friend. So, I began collecting them. Maybe one day they'll begin turning into collectors items, and maybe I can get some money off of them!" She explained. I just stared at her. My best friend, Lilly, the giantess! Although I guess it's not that. It's more "My best friend, Hannah, the doll-sized girl!" Because everyone is now a "giant" or "giantess".
"What about that doll house in your trunk?" I asked
"OH! Thanks for reminding me. That's where you'll be staying. I don't imagine you want to live in my purse or my closet or any other giant environment." She quickly grabbed her keys and ran downstairs. As I lay on her pillow, I began wondering what had happened. My mind drew to one thing. The water Lilly gave me. Half of me thought Lilly did it on purpose, but the other half couldn't. She returned with the massive 4 story doll house. As she put it to her side, it was hardly half her size.
"Lilly... You're so tall! That thing is like 4 times my size and you're twice its size." I told her, running to the edge of the bed.
"Know you know how I feel sometimes! Even today after your show when you were in the 7 inch heels. You made me seem tiny!" She said, as she grabbed me with one ins and put me on the fourth floor balcony.
"Yeah but that was just a nine inch difference. This is over a four foot difference! Lilly, did you do this to me on purpose?"
1132.title: Lilly's house

113222.title: Something else.

15.content:
"Oh man, what a good nap! Hey, Lills, how long was I out for?" I stand up to stretch my legs, and Lilly, texting replies "an hour or so." without looking up from her phone. I go outside to grab some food from the snack table and I hear someone familiar say "Oh, hey, Lilly. Where's Hannah? And why aren't you I'm your disguise? " I turn around to find it was my dad.
"I am Hannah, dad!" I say to him.
"By George you're right. You just seem so little again. I dunno what it is. Maybe I'm just tired. Anyways, I'm headed home. Try not to arrive too late." He says, as he walks off.
"I seem so little?" I thought to myself. "These heels make me 6 feet tall. He is crazy?" After I grab an extra donut, I walk back to my room and give it to Lilly. After she thanked me, I asked her what should I wear to go out and eat with her.
"Ooh., I've always been a fan of that cute little plaid, thigh-highs skirt, with the blue shirt, and the striped red and white jacket. Too bad it isn't little enough to fit me."
"Where is it? I don't see it here." I say. She gets up, grabs it, and gives it to me. When we both turn, we were shocked to find out she was the same height as me. "Wow Lilly! Look at you!" I exclaimed, while looking down to see if she was wearing heels. "You're the same height as me barefoot, and I'm 6 feet tall in these heels! You're like the height of a supermodel! How'd you grow?!"
"Uhhh, Hannah? I think you shrunk. Remember how you were saying that dress was a little small on you? Well it's big on you now. Look at it."
As I looked down, I saw that she was right. My little dress wasn't so little on my anymore. It was extremely oversized on me. "How is that possible! I'm your height, meaning I shrunk down only 2 inches!"
"Yeah but you're wearing those insanely tall 7 inch pair of heels of yours! You're actually shorter than me without them on. Quick, take 'em off!"
"I can't. I'm... I'm scared of how little I became."
"So what? You're gonna wear those heels for the rest of your life? When you shower, sleep, go to the pool, a photo shoot, everything?" She asked. After a minute of not saying anything, of just staring into each others eyes, I broke the silence.
"It's so weird, looking straight into your eyes without looking down at you. I wonder what it's like to have to look up..." I said taking off my heels, and placing them by my foot. "Wow, Lills… you're a giant!" I said, staring straight up at her. I walked by her to the door to go outside real quick. I saw a worker guy, and asked for a tape measure. He came back a minute later and gave me one. I thanked him, tossed it to Lilly, and said "Measure me!" After she did, we found out I was a mere 4'8" tall.
"You shrunk 9 inches!"
"9 inches?! That's 3/4 of a foot! I'm a legal midget now!"
15.title: Lilly's height with heels on (slow, medium,...

info.brief_description: You take on as Hannah Montana, when suddenly, you shrink!
info.description: Please note that I am restarting this story from scratch. I will actively moderate it, and make sure all the additions are somewhat grammatically correct (to the point where it's legible and we can understand what you are trying to say). So, in short, if you don't want your chapter to be fucked with, write understandable. The events in this story takes place post-Hannah Montana: The Movie. Also, no gay/lesbian/sexual things or killing. Absolutely no vore or anything if the sorts. Keep it moderately clean. Other than that, have fun
